long_description: Just right for the first-time cyclist, this value-oriented 26 in. wheel offers durability, performance and control. Features an Alex X101 rim with alloy hub and quick-release skewer. Wear-indicator line tells you when it's time to replace the wheel. Recommended 10mm rim tape, sold separately. Assembled in the USA of imported parts.
short_description: Just right for the first-time cyclist, this value-oriented 26 in. wheel offers durability, performance and control.
